name: Webflow
description: Integrate with Webflow to list, list, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Sites
tools.description: List all Webflow sites accessible with the current authorization. Returns site names, IDs, and custom domains.

tools.name: List Collections
tools.description: List CMS collections for a Webflow site. Returns collection names, slugs, and item counts.

tools.name: List Items
tools.description: List items in a Webflow CMS collection. Returns item names, slugs, and field data.

tools.name: Create Item
tools.description: Create a new item in a Webflow CMS collection. Provide field data matching the collection schema.

tools.name: Publish Site
tools.description: Publish a Webflow site to make all staged changes live. Optionally publish to specific custom domains.
